titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to convey the vessel S/S AMERICAN VICTORY to the Battle of the Atlantic Historical Society for use as a Merchant Marine memorial, for historical preservation, and for educational activities.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee On Merchant Marine.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Text of Measure Incorporated into H.R.3059.

bill.summary: 5/10/1994--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to convey the vessel S/S American Victory to the Battle of the Atlantic Historical Society for use as a Merchant Marine memorial, for historical preservation, and for educational activities if certain conditions are met.
